content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Oct 2018How to purchase Lion Phillip SREITs ETF?Hi! Just want to check, how can i purchase the above product? do i have to have a phillip capital account?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth LouLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 14 Oct 2018Basically any brokerage you will be able to purchase the SREIT ETF.you don’t need to own a Philip capital account... it’s just a brand name of the ETF. Haha0 comments0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Oct 2018It's listed on the SGX, so as long as you have a brokerage that allows purchase of shares listed on this exchange, you can just buy it from the market 0 comments0
